= Editing = == Groups == === 2.0 Groups === Groups can be used to insert another document inline directly into the current document. This allows for example to insert complex elements or style inside a list item, inside a table cell or a paragraph. Groups are delimited by the following syntactic elements: ##{{{(((...)))}}}##.
